attributes.action: PPE Equipment and Covid 19 testing for NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: This will protect NHS staff, their patients and their families
attributes.background: As a matter of urgency, the Government should provide Doctors and Nurses and other medical staff with the correct Personal Protection Equipment and Covid 19 testing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304243

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
